function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coughed droplets with a size distribution of 0.62-15.9 mm were studied, indicating potential risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in indoor environments if the size distribution is not considered.","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation and air filtration systems to remove and dilute droplets in the indoor environment.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, HEPA filters, UV-C air disinfection systems.","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, especially in crowded or poorly ventilated spaces.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"More particles were retained in the sample bag during the cough droplet study, indicating potential for increased exposure to infectious particles.","Impact":"Higher risk of exposure to infectious particles when using sample bags for cough droplet collection.","Mitigation":"Use alternative methods for cough droplet collection, such as real-time detection and measurement techniques.","Technologies":"Real-time particle counters, optical particle counters, laser diffraction systems.","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, laboratory personnel.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare institutions, laboratory facilities."},{"Description":"No significance was found in the effect of age and gender on droplet generation, potentially leading to underestimation of transmission risk in different demographic groups.","Impact":"Underestimation of transmission risk in specific age and gender demographics due to lack of significance in droplet generation study.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the influence of age and gender on droplet generation and transmission risk.","Technologies":"Epidemiological studies, demographic data analysis, advanced statistical modeling.","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, government organizations."}]}
